description: High-level metadata for a rare disease resource, registry, catalog or biobank
title: Rare disease resource

id.description: a primary identifer for the resource

type.description: the primary type for this resource

name.description: a name or short description for the resource

theme.description: A list of Orphanet codes that represent the theme of this resource.

homepage.description: The primary URL for the homepage of the resource

location.description: primary country or location associated with the resource

alias.description: alias or synonym for this resource

same_as.description: alternate identifiers or ulr for the same resource

license.description: Information about licenses assoicated with this resource

has_data_on_individuals.description: Does the resource have data about individuals, such as patient level data

has_metrics_on_registered_individuals.description: Does the resource have metrics, such as numbr of cases on registered individuals (includes patients and relatives)

has_biosamples.description: Does the resource have biological samples available. Includes biological tissue/cell line/DNA

has_contact_details.description: Does the resource provide contact details. Includes direct contacts or forms
